alert.note: Alert for Le Sueur; Scott; Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:28PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Henderson MN19 affecting Le Sueur, Scott and Sibley Counties. .Widespread flooding continues on area rivers. Additional rainfall from today and into Friday will keep river flows increased. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River at Henderson MN19. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 733.7 feet, The floodwall gates will be closed when Henderson reaches 733.7 and the river is still rising at Mankato. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 732.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 PM CDT Thursday was 732.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 734.8 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 732.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 733.5 feet on 04/05/1993. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
